original_text: In the first year that King Belshazzar ruled Babylon, Daniel had a dream. He saw visions in his head while he lay on his bed. He wrote down what he saw in the dream.
korean_text: 바벨론 벨사살 왕 원년에 다니엘이 그의 침상에서 꿈을 꾸며 머리 속으로 환상을 받고 그 꿈을 기록하며 그 일의 대략을 진술하니라

sentences.original_text: In the first year that King Belshazzar ruled Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 벨사살이 바빌론을 다스린 첫 해에

sentences.original_text: He saw visions in his head
while he lay on his bed
He wrote down what he saw in the dream
